info.description: HTTP API for the AI Chat Service
info.title: AI Chat Service API

get.description: User identity (email) is extracted from JWT token.
get.summary: Returns an array of chats owned by the user.

post.description: User identity (email) is extracted from JWT token.
post.summary: Creates a new chat with the initial message content.

get.description: User identity (email) is extracted from JWT token.
get.summary: Returns an array of messages for the specified chat.

post.description: User identity (email) is extracted from JWT token.
post.summary: Creates a new message in a specific chat.

Chat.description: Chat represents a user's chat session

id.description: The unique identifier for the chat

lastActiveDate.description: When the chat was last active

title.description: The title of the chat, derived from the first message

updatedAt.description: When the chat was last updated

userEmail.description: The email of the user who owns the chat

ErrorDetail.description: ErrorDetail represents details about validation errors

field.description: The name of the field with an error

value.description: The error message or problematic value for this field

ErrorResponse.description: ErrorResponse represents a standardized error response

code.description:
Error code that identifies the error type
VALIDATION_ERROR ValidationError  ValidationError indicates that validation failed
UNAUTHORIZED UnauthorizedError  UnauthorizedError indicates that authentication is required
FORBIDDEN ForbiddenError  ForbiddenError indicates that the user doesn't have permission
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND ResourceNotFoundError  ResourceNotFoundError indicates that the requested resource was not found
SERVER_ERROR ServerError  ServerError indicates an unexpected server error
